title: Slack Application Issues
description: Troubleshoot common Slack Desktop and Mobile app problems.

steps.title: Clear Slack Cache
steps.instruction: Help → Troubleshooting → Clear Cache and Restart. This fixes most performance and loading issues.

steps.title: Force Quit and Restart
steps.instruction: Completely close Slack (Cmd+Q on Mac or Task Manager on Windows) and relaunch it.

steps.title: Check for Updates
steps.instruction: Help → Check for Updates. Ensure you are running the latest version for security and bug fixes.

steps.title: Reset App Data
steps.instruction: Help → Troubleshooting → Reset App Data. Warning: This will log you out of all workspaces.

steps.title: Check Slack System Status
steps.instruction: Visit status.slack.com to see if there is a global outage affecting the service.
